name: Stickman Legends Premium
description:
Which weapon will you choose for your fighting journey: A Legendary Sword, a Big Hammer, a Handy Cannon, an Archery, or just the bare hands using Dark Magic?

Download NOW and get Premium starter packages today! You can choose 2 of your favorite skins for Shido and Bernald.

Game Features:
- Wide range of Characters: Mage, Warrior, Swordman, Archer, Gunner
- Each heroes has at least 5 Costumes and skins for you to customize
- Challenge yourself in survive mode with endless waves of monsters and evil
- Become the TOP players in PVP arena
- Rebirth when you reach the maximum Level and achieve the limitless power
